LanguageData.HandCanningstove.label: Fueled Food prep table

LanguageData.CookingTools.label: Cooking tools
LanguageData.CookingTools.description: Increases work speed 15%. Needs to be placed near cooking tops. Will boost the cook speed of all tables near by.

LanguageData.Campfire.label: campfire
LanguageData.Campfire.description: Cooks meals and produces heat. Burns out after a few days. As with all heat sources, it must be placed indoors so it has a closed space to heat. Refuelable.

LanguageData.Campfire_Frame.label: campfire (building)
